headline: Pentair's Hydra-Stop Purchase To Support Sustainable Water Flow In Growing Cities
summary: Pentair plc (NYSE:PNR) said Monday it will acquire Hydra-Stop LLC, a U.S.-based maker of specialty valve solutions, in a $290 million cash deal. After factoring in about $50 million in expected tax benefits, the net transaction value comes to roughly $240 million. Hydra-Stop, currently owned by Madison Industries, employs just over 50 people at its Burr Ridge, Illinois headquarters and generates nearly all its sales in the U.S. With approximately 99% of sales in the United States, the business i

headline: Pentair Announces Definitive Agreement to Acquire Hydra-Stop
summary: LONDON, August 18, 2025--Pentair plc (NYSE: PNR), a leader in helping the world sustainably move, improve and enjoy water, life’s most essential resource, today announced it has entered into a definitive agreement to acquire Hydra-Stop LLC, a leading provider of specialty valve solutions, for approximately $290 million in cash, subject to customary adjustments, from Madison Industries.
